name: Light-Bikes.io 2
description:
You liked Light-Bikes.io?
You're also a fan of destroying other people in io games??

You'll love Light-bikes.io 2!

Strap onto your bike, and take your rider across cyberspace in this unique .io game! Leave a light trail behind you and destroy all your opponents. Watch out though, others riders will be actively trying to destroy you with their light trail as well!

Light-Bikes.io 2 took everything from the first one and expanded and improved on it. Take your cycle to an all new level!

FEATURES of this io game:
* Free to play, play it anywhere anytime
* Suitable for all ages
* Simple rules but a little difficult to clear the level, you'll find the addiction.
* Now try to challenge and share it with your friends!
* Choose your bike/car skin
* Relax and enjoy
You'll surely love this lite io game once you get how it works!

Be the best on the stage and win in this io game-Light-Bikes.io 2!
